languages.text: "В тот час, когда я прикоснулся к когитатору культа, я обратил на себя тысячеглазый взгляд зла — как и любой агент, вмешивающийся в дела тех, что служат Разрушительным Силам. И это зло, без сомнений, оставило на мне незримый отпечаток — как и на любом аколите, что сражается с Архиврагом. Так будет каждый раз, когда я буду исполнять свой долг. Я достаточно много знаю о судьбах тех, кто служил Трону до меня. Достаточно, чтобы понимать, что иного пути для меня не существует".

"When I touched the cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."
languages.original_text: "В тот час, когда я прикоснулся к когитатору культа, я обратил на себя тысячеглазый взгляд зла — как и любой агент, вмешивающийся в дела тех, что служат Разрушительным Силам. languages.text: “当我触碰那台邪教的沉思者时，我引起了邪恶千眼的凝视。每一位打算干涉毁灭之力阴谋的特使，都会遭到这样的凝视。毫无疑问，那个邪恶之物在我身上留下了无形的印记，每位与混沌大敌作战的侍仆身上都带有这样的印记。我每次履行这样的职责时，都会发生这样的事情。在我之前，有无数侍奉过黄金王座的人，我很清楚他们最终的命运。我很明白，我的道路也会通向那样的结局，而且只会通向那样的结局。”
languages.original_text: "When I touched the cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."

traits.locale_text: “当我触碰那台邪教的思考器时，我引起了邪恶千眼的凝视。每一位打算干涉毁灭之力阴谋的特使，都会遭到这样的凝视。毫无疑问，那个邪恶之物在我身上留下了无形的印记，每位与混沌大敌作战的侍仆身上都带有这样的印记。我每次履行这样的职责时，都会发生这样的事情。在我之前，有无数侍奉过黄金王座的人，我很清楚他们最终的命运。我很明白，我的道路也会通向那样的结局，而且只会通向那样的结局。”

languages.original_text: "When I touched the Cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."

languages.text: «Cuando toqué el cogitador del Culto, atraje la mirada de mil ojos del mal, como todo agente que interfiere en los planes de los siervos de los Poderes Ruinosos. Y ese mal ha dejado una marca invisible pero innegable en mí, al igual que hace con todo acólito que se enfrenta al Archienemigo. Y será así siempre que cumpla con mi deber. Conozco en bastante detalle el destino de quienes han servido al Trono antes que yo. Tanto como para saber que mi camino conduce a un único final».
languages.original_text: "When I touched the cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando toqué el cogitador del Culto, atraje la mirada de mil ojos del mal, como todo agente que interfiere en los planes de los siervos de los Poderes Ruinosos. Y ese mal ha dejado una marca invisible pero innegable en mí, al igual que hace con todo acólito que se enfrenta al Archienemigo. Y será así siempre que cumpla con mi deber. Conozco en bastante detalle el destino de quienes han servido al Trono antes que yo. Tanto como para saber que mi camino conduce a un único final».

languages.text: 「魔女団の考算機に触れたとき、私は邪なる千の眼差しが己に向けられたのを感じた。それは、〈禍つ神々〉に仕える者たちの陰謀に干渉する、あらゆるエージェントが感じるものだ。そしてその悪は間違いなく私に目に見えない痕跡を残した。渾沌の勢力と戦うアコライトなら誰でもそうであるように。そしてこれは、私が義務を果たすたびに残されるのだ。私の前に玉座に仕えていた者たちの運命についてはよく知っている。私の行く先は1つだけなのだ」
languages.original_text: "When I touched the Cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."

traits.locale_text: 「魔女団の考算機に触れたとき、私は邪なる千の眼差しが己に向けられたのを感じた。それは、〈禍つ神々〉に仕える者たちの陰謀に干渉する、あらゆるエージェントが感じるものだ。そしてその悪は間違いなく私に目に見えない痕跡を残した。渾沌の勢力と戦うアコライトなら誰でもそうであるように。そしてこれは、私が義務を果たすたびに残されるのだ。私の前に玉座に仕えていた者たちの運命についてはよく知っている。私の行く先は1つだけなのだ」

languages.text: "Als ich den Cogitator des Kults berührt habe, habe ich den tausendäugigen Blick des Bösen auf mich gezogen — wie jeder Agent es tut, wenn er die Pläne jener durchkreuzt, die den Mächten der Zerstörung dienen. Und dieses Böse hat gewiss ein unsichtbares Mal auf mir hinterlassen — wie bei jedem anderen Akolythen, der gegen den Erzfeind kämpft. Und so wird es jedes Mal sein, wenn ich meine Pflicht tue. Ich weiß viel über das Schicksal derer, die dem Thron vor mir gedient haben. Genug, um zu wissen, dass mein Pfad nur an einen einzigen Ort führen kann."
languages.original_text: "When I touched the cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich den Cogitator des Kults berührt habe, habe ich den tausendäugigen Blick des Bösen auf mich gezogen — wie jeder Agent es tut, wenn er die Pläne jener durchkreuzt, die den Mächten der Zerstörung dienen. Und dieses Böse hat gewiss ein unsichtbares Mal auf mir hinterlassen — wie bei jedem anderen Akolythen, der gegen den Erzfeind kämpft. Und so wird es jedes Mal sein, wenn ich meine Pflicht tue. Ich weiß viel über das Schicksal derer, die dem Thron vor mir gedient haben. Genug, um zu wissen, dass mein Pfad nur an einen einzigen Ort führen kann."

languages.text: « Lorsque j'ai touché le cogitateur du culte, j'ai attiré les mille yeux du mal sur moi, comme tous les agents chaque fois qu'ils interfèrent avec les plans de ceux qui servent les Puissances de la Ruine. Et ce mal m'a marqué d'un stigmate invisible, comme il le fait avec tous les acolytes qui s'opposent au Grand Ennemi. Ce cycle est condamné à se répéter chaque fois que j'accomplirai mon devoir. Je suis suffisamment au fait de ce qu'il est advenu de ceux qui ont servi le Trône avant moi pour savoir que la voie que j'ai empruntée n'a qu'une seule issue possible. »
languages.original_text: "When I touched the cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. And that evil undoubtedly left an invisible mark upon me — as it does on any acolyte who fights against the Archenemy. And this will be the case every time I do my duty. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."

languages.text: "Tarikat kavramsayarına dokunduğum an, Yıkıcı Güçler'in tekerine çomak sokan her hizmetkâr gibi ben de şerrin bin gözünü de üzerimde hissettim. Yine o kötülük, Şerbaşı'na meydan okuyan her havari gibi benim de üzerimde görünmez izini bıraktı. Kaldı ki bu, vazifemi her ifa edişimde olur. Taht'a benden önce hizmet etmişlerin akıbetini biliyorum. Bu yolda yürüyenlerin varacağı yeri de çok iyi biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "When I touched the cult's cogitator, I drew the thousand-eye gaze of evil upon myself — as any agent does when they interfere in the schemes of those who serve the Ruinous Powers. I know a good deal about the fates of those who have served the Throne before me. Enough to know that my path leads to one place and one place only."
